罸字的基本解释

罸
fá
同“罚”。

罸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fá］
［《廣韻》房越切，入月，奉。］
“罚1”的繁体字。亦作“罸1”。
(1)罪行。
(2)刑罚。
(3)处罚。
(4)指宴饮及游戏、竞技时对输方或犯规者的处分。
(5)讨伐。
(6)鞭挞。
(7)出金赎罪。
(8)星名。
(9)用同“發”。参见“罰誓”、“罰願”。

Punish
Basic explanation of words
Punish
fá
Same as "penalty".
Punish
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fá］
["Guangyun" the room is more cut, into the moon, bong. ]
Traditional characters for "Punish 1". Also called "penalty 1".
(1) Crime.
(2) Penalties.
(3) Punishment.
(4) Refers to sanctions against losers or offenders during banquets, games, and competitions.
(5) Crusade.
(6) Flogging.
(7) Withdrawal of money for atonement.
(8) Star name.
(9) Use the same "fa". See "penalty oath", "penalty vow".
